items.question: Is a 7-day website quality?
items.answer: Yes, our process is designed to guarantee optimal quality. We have clear and structured steps. Each site is carefully checked before going live.

items.question: What is the total cost?
items.answer: The cost depends on the chosen features. You only pay for what you need. This allows you to control your budget.

items.question: Can I add features?
items.answer: Absolutely, we can easily add additional features to your site. This can be done at any time. Your site will evolve with your practice.

items.question: Are there any guarantees?
items.answer: We offer a satisfaction guarantee. If you're not satisfied, we'll work with you until you are. Your success is our priority.

items.question: How does payment work?
items.answer: Payment is made in several stages. A deposit is required to start. The balance is due upon site delivery.
